text: A father wished for his two children the best possible mystical education. For that reason, he sent them to be trained spiritually by a renowned teacher of Vedantic philosophy. After a year, the children returned to their father's home. The father asked one of them about the Brahman, and the son spread about the Deity making all sorts of illustrated references to scriptures, philosophical texts, and metaphysical teachings. Then the father asked the other son about the Brahman, and he simply kept quiet. Then the father, speaking to the latter, declared: "Son, you do know what Brahman really is. FIN
title: La elocuencia del silencio
author: nan Anónimo
